name: com.miniit.asset-bundle-manager
description:
Supports Google Play Asset Delivery (Android) and On Demand Resources (iOS).

This is an extended version of Asset Bundle Manager by Kevin Yockey (https://github.com/SadPandaStudios/AssetBundleManager).

samples.description: Needed for iOS build. Integrate int into your project.
Sample initialization and usind Asset Bundle Manager
